snippet: The event was seen as a chance for Brazil to speed its development. But bureaucracy and a lack of planning have proved costly.
lead_paragraph: The event was seen as a chance for Brazil to speed its development. But bureaucracy and a lack of planning have proved costly.

headline.main: A World Cup Effort Few Are Celebrating
headline.print_headline: A World Cup Effort Few Are Celebrating
headline.seo: Brazil’s Preparations for 2014 World Cup Lag
